1.content: Where are you staying in holiday?
1.title: the beginning

11.content:
you go to Madrid to have some fun and pick up girls.
Who do you want to be?
11.title: Madrid

112.content:
" Hi boys, are you ready for spanish entertainment?" you say
" Yeah, come on friends, Madrid is ours"
They all go out by their hotel and started to visited the city. The first visit is for Prado. After that they decide to go in a small restaurant to eat something.
They eat and decide to go at Plaza de Espana when a kid of 9 years stop them.
" Hola amigos, turistas?"
" yes small friend, what do you want?"
The kid, a typical spanish kid with brown eyes and hairs, says that he wanted aan ice cream and he hadn't enough money.
What do they do, offer or not?
112.title: Jeremy

choices: His brothers, Ricardo 4 and Julian 7 arrives
1122.content:
" Come on friend, an ice cream, buy it to this kid!!" you say together Marco but your friends doesn't agree that.
So the kid say to follow him, and you go together with him, when he enters in a house.
You enter and suddenly a green ray hits you.
You wake up and you see that you are shrunken.
"Oh my god, what happened?"
"Hola mi amigos, soy Guillermo Miguel Angel Lopez y ahora soy vuestro dueno"....
"What does he say?" you ask to Marco who know Spanish but Marco is terrified and says " we are his slaves"
"Not only mine but of my brothers and friends too"...Guillermo answer revealing good knowledge of english
"Here in Spain" he continues " parents teach us how shrink people and torture them and devour them cause we can grow up"
WHAAAAAT??? You are all afraid and terrified and start to run to escape by this trap but in less time his enormous hand grabs all of you and take you near face...
"Vosotros partenece a mi ahora, y ninguno llegarà a salvarve, ahahahahah"
1122.title: No

choices: Find other tourists to eat or to give them to your hungry brothers
11222.content:
"Necessito comer, tengo mucha hambre" he says...
and Marco start to scream "He wants Eat us, we must escape now, go go goooooo"
You start to run away by that spanish kid when his smelly feet steps on you...
all you can say is "mmmmmmmmm" and sniff that smell..
then he grubs with feet toes Sebastian and tosses him in his mouth.
You can hear screams and cry the poor german and kid saying" mmmm como es bueno"...
the tongue roll and like all the body of tiny man and saliva covers all...
then he say " Now my little friend, go down, your new home is waiting, tomorrow you'll be my shit, spanish shit hahahahah"
and swallow. He can feel Sebastian squirm and wriggle in his throat and then in the stomach.
He take three americans near his mouth and release a burp. The smelly air hits two poor americans that screams "noooo, it's possible, I don't want finish in there, please have pity, we want to live and become kid poo, please."
Guillermo say " Ok, you'll be safe.....for now"..
"OH god thanks" say the three.
But quickly the kid put them in mouth and before they can react, they are sliding down his throat.
"ahahahahahah, they believe me and now are in my stomach, in my belly" and pass his hand on his belly.
Then grub John and Jack and put them under his butt and release a fart, then take the two and say...
"now you must go inside me,I want you, and you can't do absolutely nothing to escape from me. I 'm your spanish god, we spanish are superior to all people of the world, and we'll eat them all. ahahahahah. Now good trip in my tummy...".
the two english stay in mouth while the kid grub you and Marco and grins and smiles evily at you, and say" a french dessert and an italian sweet"...
Wow, my tummy, enjoy them" say to his gurgle tummy...
You can hear the screams by his stomach and by two english in mouth, than he opens his mouth and release a great burp than swallow the two powerless english. And you see all.
The terror increase in you and Marco cause you know that you are finishing in a spanish kid, inside the stomach of a young spanish kid.
HE tosses you two in his smell mouth and after play a few with his young tongue he send you to his throat.
You can feel his muscles throat send you down and you splash in his stomach.
You can see all your friend in terror tryng to knock on stomach wall but this make only try plasure to Guillermo that say " Ahhhhh that's delicious, now i'm full and happy and you are all mine, ahahah"
then he release a burp and lots of fart....
No one in the world will see you more cause you are inside a spanish kid and you remain forever in Spain.
11222.title: He eats them all

112221.content:
"Stop beating on the stomach walls! This only speeds up the digestion." you say. Everyone looks at you. "But what else should we do?" Marco yells at you.
Guillermo hears the screams from his stomach and laughs. "You can do nothing but digest and become my shit." he says to you.
Digesting and getting shit out of ​​this Spanish boy makes you all panicked.
When Guillermo arrives home, he lies down on his bed and listens to your desperate, last screams and falls asleep.
After Guillermo fell asleep you accept that there is only one way out of here. The natural way. You're going to die in the stomach of a Spanish kid and all that's left of you and your friends are a few bones in his shit.

The next morning ...

Guillermo wakes up and gets up from his bed. He has to farting heavily.
"The way it smells, that must have been the German guy." he says and laughs. "Well, that does not matter, I have to shit anyway." He sits down on the toilet and starts to squeeze. He pushes the shit, which is decorated with your planks bones from his asshole and lets him fall into the toilet. After he has finished, he gets up and looks into the toilet.
"How did you like being pushed out of my ass, out of the ass of your spanish god?" he says and laughs again as he flush you away like the piece of shit you are now.
112221.title: Digest them

112222.content:
Marco burped as he rubbed his now full stomach, he enjoyed the feeling of the tiny men struggling inside. He put his sneakers back on and returned to the square of Madrid. He looked around and saw a bunch of tourists sitting around, talking to each other, he smiled as he went over to them.

The Spanish people around the square saw this and moved away, knowing what was going to happen. Marco went up to the group and smiled "Please may i have some money for an ice cream?" he opened his eyes nice and wide.

The tourists didn't give him anything and he turned away and when he turned around the tourists had shrunk and he collected them up in his hand, giggling. "You are all mine now, my brothers are hungry at home". he giggled as he dropped the tourists inside his bag on his back.

Arriving home he saw his two brothers, Ricardo,4 and Julian,7 sitting at the table. They smiled when they saw him and he grinned "I hope you boys are hungry". he opened the bag and out rolled the tourists, there were 8 of them, all Americans. The two boys licked their lips as they began to feed.

Who eats first?
112222.title: Find other tourists to eat or to give them to y...

11223.content:
Ricardo and Julian back from school.
Julian says that it has much hunger and Ricardo also.
So they are asking Guillermo to prepare him the afternoon snack.
Guillermo says "I have a surprise for you, today I have captured some tourists and now they will play to seek with us, they are hiding and who find them eats... Let us start. They are hidden in floor above. starts the game ". The Brothers are enthusiastic and do not see the time to put those poor boys in their stomach.
"here they are" you say hiding inside the smelling shoe of Guillermo hoping that there would not have seen. "Oh no," says Marco terrified by the idea to become the meal of spanish children.
"Here we are, we are coming and we hunger ahahah" shouting the boys from the scales. "it's time of the snack" says Ricardo "and I will have all of you, I'll eat them all, you will all mine" he adds.
Brad, Phil, Bea, john and jack was hidden in Ricardo's room.
who do the boys find before?
11223.title: His brothers, Ricardo 4 and Julian 7 arrives

12.content: You decide to go to Barcelona. So you arrive in hotel and prepare to visit the city. Who do you want to be?
12.title: Barcelona

15.content: Who between this young spanish actor in holiday you meet?
15.title: Malaga

info.brief_description: Go to holiday in Spain and remains forever there in a spanish's body
info.description:
you are on holiday in Spain in a hot summer. You are togheter other people:
an Italian: Marco;
a french: Jeremy;
a german: Sebastian;
two english: John and Jack;
and three americans: Brad, Phil and Bea.

You go in Spain with happiness and joy but.... a surprise is behind the corner.
You are captured by kids or teen that torture you in all ways until voring you. So you become Spanish...
